content.raw:
It looks like this isn't solved yet as of ign-math4, the `Libs` section on the pc file looks pretty much the same to me for ign-math2 and 4:

## ignition-math2.pc

~~~
prefix=/usr/local
libdir=${prefix}/lib
includedir=${prefix}/include/ignition/math2

Name: Ignition Math
Description: A set of math classes for robot applications
Version: 2.8.0
Requires:
Libs: "-L${libdir}" -lignition-math2
CFlags: "-I${includedir}" -std=c++11
~~~

## ignition-math4.pc

~~~
prefix=/usr/local
libdir=${prefix}/lib
includedir=${prefix}/include/ignition/math4

Name: Ignition math
Description: A set of math classes for robot applications
Version: 4.0.0~pre3
Requires:
Requires.private:
Libs: -L${libdir} -lignition-math4 
Libs.private:
CFlags: -I${includedir}  -std=c++14

~~~
